welcomePage.title: Welcome
welcomePage.description: Welcome to UBS Pre-Registration, Our goal is to make your registration process as easy as possible. Please follow the steps below to complete your registration.

loginPage.title: Login Now
loginPage.description: Please login using your Unklab google Account! if you don't have one, please contact IT Helpdesk

loginFailedPage.title: Login Failed
loginFailedPage.description: Please use your Unklab google account! Your registration number is not registered

noSessionPage.title: No Session
noSessionPage.description: Please wait until pre registration session start to access this page

finishPage.title: Thank You!
finishPage.description: Your pre-registration information has been received. Good Luck!

navigation.modalDescription: Are you sure you want to logout?
navigation.title: Choose Your Class

scheduleButton.modalDescription: If you are sure, please submit
scheduleButton.subject: Subject

subjectContainer.modalSksDescription: You can only have 20 SKS. You can delete 1 class or look for a class with the right number of SKS.
subjectContainer.modalCollisionDescription: Class you've chosen have collision. Please choose another class.
subjectContainer.noResultDescription: We can't find any results for

subjectItem.modalEditDescription: You will be redirected back to edit your class
subjectItem.modalDeleteDescription: You can still select this class again if you delete it.

submitClass.tooltip: Click here to submit your class
submitClass.modalNoClassSelectedDescription: You haven't selected any class yet. Please select at least 1 class.
